LanguageData.OG_Assassinorum_Tech_Base.label: Officio Assassinorum
LanguageData.OG_Assassinorum_Tech_Base.description: Grants you access to the Officio Assassinorum
LanguageData.OG_Assassinorum_Tech_Weapons_Vindicare.d: Grants you access to STC templates for Weapons used by the Officio Assassinorum's Vindicare Temple.\n\nRequires Royalty
LanguageData.OG_Assassinorum_Tech_Weapons_Callidus.de: Grants you access to STC templates for Weapons used by the Officio Assassinorum's Callidus Temple.\n\nRequires Royalty
LanguageData.OG_Assassinorum_Tech_Weapons_Culexus.des: Grants you access to STC templates for Weapons used by the Officio Assassinorum's Culexus Temple.\n\nRequires Royalty
LanguageData.OG_Assassinorum_Tech_Weapons_Eversor.des: Grants you access to STC templates for Weapons used by the Officio Assassinorum's Eversor Temple.\n\nRequires Royalty
